xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 310
LUCK OF THE FRYRISH
Ron Weiner Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: Broadcast Simultaneously One Year In Future.
(Old New York; The Past) Brooklyn Pre-Med Junior Hospital. A woman is in labour in a delivery room. Her husband sits in the corner reading Cold Warrior magazine. They are Fry's parents.
xml.speak: Push Mrs Fry, push!
You can do it honey! Squeeze one out for America!
xml.info: He goes back to reading his magazine.
xml.speak: (shouting) Hey keep it down it's the 9th inning!
xml.info: She holds a portable radio to her ear.
xml.speak: Swing the bat you bum!
xml.info: The doctor lifts up a baby. It cries.
xml.speak: It's a boy. And look at that red hair.
You sayin' my son's a commie?
xml.info: Mrs Fry cheers.
xml.speak: This is the happiest day of my life!
xml.info: The doctor puts the baby on her lap.
xml.speak: Here's your baby ma'am.
Yeah OK thanks.
So, what should we name him?
Uh, you pick. I picked dinner last night.
Well, I was thinking Philip. After those screwdrivers?
That's a fantastic idea. More morphine please.
xml.info: Hospital Room. Mr Fry puts Philip in a bed and introduces his brother to him.
xml.speak: Look Yancy, its your baby brother Philip.
I wanna be named Philip! Me Philip! Me Philip!

Son your name is Yancy, just like me and my grandfather and so on. All the way back to minuteman Yancy Fry, who blasted commies in the American Revolution. Philip, until I find a suitable model of an ICBM you'll have to make do learnin' to fear this toy spacecraft.
xml.info: He turns the mobile on and leaves. Philip laughs as the mobile turns around. Yancy snatches away the rocket.
xml.speak: Mine! Mine!
xml.info: Philip starts crying. Yancy throws the rocket out the window.
Fade to: (The Present (i.e. The Future)) The Planet Express ship flies down to Earth and lands in the car park outside Flushing Downs.
Flushing Downs Stands. The horse race starts and the crew stand up and cheer.
xml.speak: (shouting) C'mon!
(shouting) Baby needs a new pair of shoes!
To hell with your spoiled baby, I need those shoes!
xml.info: The horses cross the finish line.
xml.speak: No fair! You changed the outcome by measuring it.
xml.info: He tears up his slip. Fry looks through some binoculars.
xml.speak: How'd you do Fry?
I'll tell you when my horse finishes...bad.
xml.info: Cut to: Flushing Downs Luxury Box. Mr and Mrs Wong and Amy stand talking in the box while a classy orchestra plays for them.
xml.speak: In today's field we own four horses and two jockeys.
We just put our best jockey out to stud Amy, he's perfect for you!
xml.info: The very short jockey strolls up behind Amy.
xml.speak: Hey baby, ever do it in a suitcase?
xml.info: Cut to: Flushing Downs Stand.
xml.speak: Ooo look! It's the centaur race!
xml.info: The bells rings and the centaurs start running around the track, horsewhipping themselves as they go. Fry crosses his fingers.
xml.speak: Come on, come on! Hey Leela, how 'bout a kiss for good luck? I meant tongue luck.
xml.info: The centaurs cross the finish line.
Fry groans.
xml.speak: I am so unlucky! I've run over black cats that were luckier than me.
xml.info: Flushing Downs Horse D'Oeuvres Stand.
xml.speak: Get your piping hot horse burgers, horse fries, horse cake and shakes. We got tongue straight from the horse's mouth.
Hmm.
It all sounds good.
All our horses are 100% horse fed for that double juiced in horse goodness.
I'll have a cholesterol free omelette with horse beaters.
And you sir, how can I horse you?
I'll have a horse coke.
Horse Pepsi OK?
Neigh.
xml.info: Flushing Downs Stables. Bender sneaks in disguised as a horse. He innocently whistles and injects a horse with Comatonin. It yawns. Bender chuckles. The jockey runs in behind him.
xml.speak: Hey what are you doing?
This.
xml.info: He injects the jockey and he falls over asleep.
Flushing Downs Stand. Bender is back with the group. Fry prays.
xml.speak: Dear Horse God, I know I don't usually pray to you, sometimes I doubt you even exist. But if you're willing to grant me luck, please, stamp your hoof once. Come on number six move it! Don't do that! What are you - Man it's contagious!
xml.info: The one horse that started the race gallops over the finish line.
Bender's slip flashes. He has won $2500. He cheers.
xml.speak: That'll teach those other horses to take drugs!
xml.info: Fry tears up his slip.
xml.speak: That's it! You can only take my money for so long before you take it all, and I say enough. I've got one dollar left, and this one I'm holding onto! Oh no you don't! I may not know much about horses but I know a lot about doing anything for one dollar! If you think bad luck can defeat me then you don't know my name is Philip J -
xml.info: He reaches over to the wire with the rake but it electrocutes him. He pulls the rake away and breathes a sigh of relief. Then he gets struck by lightning and falls.

Cut to: Outside Flushing Downs. Fry has landed upside down in a dustbin and is smoking from the lightning strike. The Horse D'Oeuvres man comes outside through a door carrying a bucket of horse leftovers.
xml.speak: That is one unlucky guy!
xml.info: He pours the bucket over Fry and leaves.
Fade to: (The Past) Basketball Court. 12 year old Fry dribbles the ball where Yancy can't get to it.
xml.speak: Kareem's got the skyhook but Philip J. Fry's got the spacehook!
xml.info: He throws the ball but it bounces off the basket. Yancy chases after it and dribbles it back to the basket.
xml.speak: Yancy drives, he goes up with his patented spacehook!
xml.info: He throws the ball and it goes through the hoop.
xml.speak: Hey. That's my patented spacehook! You stole it!
You're not the president of it!
xml.info: He points at the ball and Fry runs to get it. He looks across at the grass next to him and sees something growing there. A seven leaf clover. He picks it up.
xml.speak: Holy camolie! A seven leaf clover!
(shouting) I'm dying of old age!
xml.info: Fry tucks the clover into his sweatband and dribbles the ball back onto the court. He shoots, Yancy jumps to get the ball but misses and the ball goes through the hoop. Fry cheers.
xml.speak: Phil wins! Yancy's fans are stunned! There'll be no celebration at the Yancy dome!
Lucky.
xml.info: Fry takes the clover out from his sweatband and gawps at it.
Fade to: (The Present) Planet Express: Meeting Room. The crew are gathered around the table. Fry is nearly bald from the lightning strike and Bender whistles while he counts his winnings.
xml.speak: Well someone's in a good mode.
Let's just say I lucked out at the track! Also I rigged one race.
Pah. I'd have won a lot of money too if I still had my lucky seven leaf clover. Plus I'd still have my hair.
xml.info: Enter a Hairbot which has replacement hair for the crew growing on it.
xml.speak: I got your page Mr Fry, your new hair is ready!
xml.info: He takes the hair off his head and puts it on Fry's head. Fry shuffles it into place.
xml.speak: So whatever happened to this seven leaf clover?
I hid it in a secret hiding place who's location I never told anyone. Not even Scruffy.
xml.info: Scruffy leans against the doorframe suspiciously and walks out.
xml.speak: So the clover is still in the hiding place maybe?
Hey yeah! Maybe it is still there! Underground in the ruins of Old New York. Helping some ant defeat another ant or helping some piece of dirt turn it's luck around.
Dirt doesn't need luck.
I'm going down there to get my clover back. Now some of the tunnels have metal bars so I'll need someone who's good at bending. Leela how 'bout you?
Sure I'll do it.
Like hell you will. Bending's my middle name.
It is?
Yep. My full name is Bender Bending Rodriguez
xml.info: Street. In the middle of the road Fry lifts a PJ's manhole cover.
xml.speak: Here's the entrance. From this moment on I declare my bad luck officially over.
xml.info: The ladder gives way beneath him and he plummets into the darkness then lands in a heap. Bender and Leela peer into the hole.
xml.speak: He was fun.
xml.info: Ruins Of Old New York. Fry, Bender and Leela walk down a deserted ruined street. Leela holds up her wrist thing.
xml.speak: Well if we get bored I've got Tetris on this thing.
xml.info: The crew come to the edge of a cliff top and ahead of them are lots of ruined buildings.
xml.speak: Look, up ahead.
Old New York. The city that inspired a casino in Las Vegas.
xml.info: Time Lapse. They continue walking down a street.
xml.speak: Wow! We've got Manhattan all to ourselves! I can finally do all the crazy stuff I always dreamed of doing! Howard Stern s overrated! Uh, oops!
New York is so burned.
And remember when Mayor Giuliani cracked down on jaywalking?
No.
Well Rudy, how'd you like this action?
xml.info: He walks across the road and a huge lizard flattens him.
Fade to: (The Past) New York Street. A bunch of guys dressed in late 80s crap stand around. Fry and Yancy are with them.
xml.speak: As you know the big breakdance is Saturday. So if we wanna win those Jam Master J autographed parachute pants our crew has to pop, lock and bust the freshest. Noticwably F.A.T., drop us a beat. Name?
Cosmic F.
Style?
Outer space.
Special moves?
The moonwalk...the robot...the zero G!
xml.info: He steps back and Yancy steps forward.
xml.speak: Name?
Cosmic Y.
Style?
Uh, deep space!
Deep space??
Special moves?
The spacewalk...
xml.info: He copies Fry's moonwalk.
xml.speak: Hey!
...The robot...
xml.info: He copies Fry's robot.
xml.speak: The robot? That's similar to mine!
The zero G!
xml.info: He copies Fry's zero G.
xml.speak: What are you doing? You totally ripped off my routine.
You callin' me a biter?
xml.info: Noticeably F.A.T. stops beating and everyone gasps.
xml.speak: Why do you always have to steal everything from me Yancy? Find your own life and live it.
Stop illin'! Word!
Well I'd like to see you try and steal this. the septuple head spin.
xml.info: Everyone gasps.
xml.speak: He's just scratching. No one's ever done more than a quadruple.
Oh yeah? Noticeably F.A.T., rewind the tape.
xml.info: And he does. Fry pulls the clover out of his shoe and tucks it into the sweatband on his head. He does the head spin.
xml.speak: Crazy sucker!
Phil, you're hot!
.A.T. That was ice cold bro!
Fry if I ever see you try anything that crazy again, this crew might just have some new parachute pants!
xml.info: Everyone cheers and Fry gawps at the clover again.
xml.speak: Stop hogging the clover.
xml.info: He struggles to get it from Fry. Fry pushes him away and runs away. Yancy chases him.
Fade to: (The Present) Ruins Of Old New York. Fry gets up off the road and dusts himself off.
xml.speak: Alright team, let's go find that clover!
Which way to your house? The sign says we're at 71st street.
xml.info: Fry looks at the sign.
xml.speak: 71st street? Hmm, never heard of it. Downtown could be in any direction.
No sweat, we'll just take a spin on the B-train!
xml.info: Cut to: Ruined Station. Bender attaches himself to the train tracks and electricity shoots through him and he giggles.
xml.speak: Ooo that feels funny! This is the Brooklyn bound B-train making local stops at wherever the hell I feel like. Watch for the closing doors.
xml.info: He makes a bing bong noise and sets off down the track.
Newkirk Avenue Station Ruins. Bender stops at the station and Fry and Leela get off. A hobo is asleep on Bender's back.
xml.speak: Wake up buddy end of the line!
xml.info: The hobo mutters and climbs off. Fry looks around.
xml.speak: Gosh my old neighbourhood! That's the bench where I found some shirts! That fire hydrant! In summer we'd light it on fire! On that corner, some guy with a bushy beard handed out a socialist newsletter!
Was it poorly xeroxed?
You'd better believe it!
The old comedians were right, this place is a lot different from LA!
xml.info: A mutant pokes his head up through a sewer grate.
xml.speak: Pardon me but did I overhear you saying you used to live here?
That's right.
Did you know Andy Goldman?
Yeah, he was my neighbour. Why?
I mutated from him!
Get out of here! What's Andy up to these days?
xml.info: Andy's head suddenly pokes out from the mutant's chest.
xml.speak: The short answer is I'm teaching.
xml.info: The mutant disappears back into the sewer.
xml.speak: He seemed nice.
Sure when he's sober!
xml.info: Outside The Ruins Of The Frys' House.
xml.speak: Holy camolies! The house I grew up in! It's still there!
xml.info: The house is a battered ruin.
xml.speak: Man, father time really took a bat to this place.
xml.info: Fade to: (The Past) Outside The Frys' House. It looks exactly the same. Yancy chases Fry into the house.
xml.speak: That stupid clover is a worthless piece of garbage! Give it give it give it!
xml.info: Cut to: The Frys' Living Room. Mrs Fry is playing miniature golf.
xml.speak: Mom! Help!
xml.info: Mrs Fry hits the golf ball and breaks the cup she was aiming for.
xml.speak: Yes!
xml.info: Enter Fry and Yancy.
xml.speak: Mom, Yancy's trying to steal my clover.
(uninterested) Yancy, stealing is wrong.
xml.info: Yancy starts chasing Fry again.
xml.speak: I'm gonna pile drive you! You're dead meat!
xml.info: Cut to: The Frys' Basement. Mr Fry reassembles a torch.
xml.speak: What's happenin' up there? Did Kremlin Joe let fly with the nukes?
Not yet commander. Yancy's just trying to steal my stuff as usual.
Well he'd better keep his hands off these bananas. Gonna need them when the radiation turns us all into monkeys.
xml.info: He lifts a crate of bananas onto the table and climbs the ladder out of the basement. Fry pulls a sheet off something and takes his clover out of his pocket.
xml.speak: The Ronco Record Vault! Yancy'll never get his hands on you in here or my money back. Ah The Breakfast Club soundtrack! Man I can't wait til I'm old enough to feel ways about stuff! Stay safe clover. I may need you again someday.
xml.info: He runs up the stairs.
Fade to: (The Present) The Ruins Of The Frys' Basement. Enter Fry, Leela and Bender.
xml.speak: This was the storage room. My dad spent years turning it into a bomb shelter.
And yet you guys never had a single nuclear war.
What a waste.
This is it! My Ronco Record Vault! I still remember the combination. Three. It's stuck.
The Achilles heel of the Ronco design is it's structural resonance frequency. Allow me. There we go!
xml.info: Fry pulls out the record.
xml.speak: Here it is. The Breakfast Club soundtrack.
You mean breakfast club sandwich?
I hid my seven leaf clover in this very record jacket so my brother Yancy wouldn't get it. Here goes. It's gone! the whole place has been cleaned out! Yancy stole my clover! That thief!
How do you know it didn't disintergrate?
Everything else in here held up OK.
Except Sports by Huey Lewis.
xml.info: The Ruins Of Prospect Park. Fry, Leela and Bender walk back up the street without the clover.
xml.speak: I don't know why my brother hated me so much.
Aw, brothers always fight. I'm sure deep down he loved you. He just never got a chance to say it before you got frozen.
You think? 'Cause I always kinda wished that -
xml.info: He gasps. In front of them is a huge statue.
xml.speak: Who is that God-like figure?
It's my brother Yancy! And there in his lapel - my seven leaf clover! I knew he stole it.
Hold the phone. If that's Yancy then why does the inscription read Philip J. Fry?
Wait a second! That's my name! Good Lord. He ditched his goofy name and stole mine!
Apparently this brave adonis, this cadillac of men, was the first person on Mars.
First person on Mars?? I should have been the first person on Mars! He stole my clover, he stole my name and he stole my life! And now he broke my hand.
His legend lives on.
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room. The statue now stands in the room.
xml.speak: So you opened the record vault and the clover was gone?
Yep, nothing in there but all the best music of the 1980's in one amazing collection.
Survivor, Pat Benetar, The Scorpions. The list goes on.
That clover helped my ratfink brother steal my dream of going into space. Now I'll never get there.
You went there this morning for doughnuts.
xml.info: Hermes reads the statue's inscription.
xml.speak: First person on Mars? Oh so your brother was that Philip J. Fry!
I'm Philip J. Fry! He stole my name after I got frozen.
Shut up friends. My internet browser heard us saying the word "Fry" and it found a movie about Philip J. Fry for us. It alwso opened my calendar to Friday and ordered me some French fries.
xml.info: An image of Yancy appears on the screen and changes as the narrator narrates.
xml.speak: That should have been me!
xml.info: In the movie Yancy board a small plane.
Yancy closes the plane's door and a picture of the clover is on it.
xml.speak: That's my clover! Yancy stole it!
That's what I'm known for!
IN MOVIE Phil came in right, sturmmed out this tune yeah. And I said "That's a number one record!"
xml.info: The scene changes to an cemetary orbitting the Earth.
xml.speak: So that's where my clover is? Hey, is that orbitting cemetary near here?
It will be in a couple hours.
Good. Leela, Bender, we're going graverobbing.
I'll get my kit.
xml.info: Fade to: (The Past) The Frys' Living Room. A woman slips a camoflage tuxedo onto Yancy.
xml.speak: Thanks for lending me your tux Dad. It'll be perfect for my wedding.
Yancy, that tux got me through Nam in style! I just wish your brother were still around to see this.
I'll never forget the day Philip disappeared. Wisconsin won the rose bowl 17-9. Oh I miss him.
xml.info: Mr Fry pats her leg.
xml.speak: Oh that reminds me. I was thinking of rummaging through Phil's records for something to play at the wedding.
Have a look downstairs. Your brother may be missing but his crap sure isn't.
xml.info: The Frys' Basement. Yancy sorts through a box marked Phil's Stuff. He gets out a Whitefish flag and puts it to one side. He pulls out a piece of paper with a crude drawing of a rocket and a figure standing on top of it. The figure is labelled "Phil" and at the bottom of the paper is "By Philip Fry Aged 20". Yancy folds it up and puts it in his pocket. He tries Fry's record vault but it won't open. He gets a pot of Doh-Doh out from the box, sticks it to the vault, lights it and blows the door open. He pulls out a random record.
xml.speak: Hmm Breakfast Club, this'll clear out the room at the end of the reception.
xml.info: He flips the record over and the clover falls out of the sleeve. He picks it up and gasps.
Fade to: (The Present) The Planet Express flies up from the Earth and lands inside Orbitting Meadows National Cemetary.
Cut to: Orbitting Meadows National Cemetary.
xml.speak: They buried your brother in the world heroes section? I'm impressed.
I should be the one in that grave!
xml.info: The pass two guards who salute. Fry and Leela salute them and Bender whacks his head with the spade.
Time Lapse.
xml.speak: Hmm. We lost Bender.
xml.info: Bender is digging up a nearby grave.
xml.speak: There. Now no one will be able to say I don't own John Larroquette's spine!
xml.info: Time Lapse. The crew approach Yancy's grave.
xml.speak: Aha! My brother's grave!
xml.info: The monument on top of the grave is in the shape of a rocket and Yancy is chiselled onto it. Leela reads the inscription.
xml.speak: (reading) Philip Fry, the original Martian.
It's all lies every word of it! He wasn't original, he wasn't a Martian, he wasn't Philip Fry and since when is he a the?
You're twice the the he ever was.
It's clovering time!
xml.info: They start to dig. Fry hits the monument with his spade and knocks some moss off it. He reads the hidden inscription.

Fade to: (The Past) Yancy's House. Yancy's wife nurses a baby while Yancy stands over them.
'S WIFE So, had any ideas for names Yancy?
Uh, I'm sorta thinking one. Daddy has a present for you today. Do you know what it is? It's a lucky clover that can help you be successful at anything you do - even breakdancing - and it once belonged to someone very special.
'S WIFE I know what name you wanna give him Yancy. It's OK.
Really? Son, I'm naming you Philip J. Fry in honour of my little brother, who I miss every day. I love you Philip, and I always will.
[He looks across the room. Hanging over the baby's cot is the picture Fry drew of him on the rocket. Yancy kisses Philip and he giggles.
Fade to: (The Present) Orbitting Meadows National Cemetary. Fry reads the inscription out loud.
xml.speak: (reading) Here lies Philip J. Fry, named for his uncle, to carry on his spirit.
xml.info: Bender forces open the coffin.
xml.speak: Pay dirt! I got the clover! Plus his wedding ring. Sorry ladies, I'm taken! Hey Fry you want me to smack the corpse up a little?
xml.info: Fry, tears in his eyes, takes the clover from Bender.
xml.speak: Uh, Bender, I think Fry needs a moment alone.
xml.info: She helps him out of the grave.
xml.speak: Alright grab a shovel. I'm only one skull short of a Mouseketeer reunion.
xml.info: He and Leela walk away. Fry puts the clover back in the grave and smiles. The episode plays out with Simple Minds' Don't You (Forget About Me).
THE END
